translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Opposite of Ideas

original: 12.17. Saraṇaduka, Saññojanadukādi🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ
analyzed: saraṇa duka saññojana duka ādi  na saraṇam no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam nogantham dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam no ogham dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇa
translated: The Numerical Series of the Terms of Relation in Pairs🔽The Non-Returner and the Non-Fettered, etc.

original: noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ🔽noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: no yogam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇa 🔽na uparāmāsam dhammam paṭicca 🔽hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
